data.name: cuwRegisterCompleteSuccessText
data.value: Your account has been successfully created.

data.name: cuwRegisterCreateUserStepTitle
data.value: Sign Up for your New Account

data.name: exCannotRemoveDefaultProvider
data.value: This provider is the default provider. Please select a different default provider and then try removing this provider.

data.name: lblAlreadyReviewed
data.value: You have already reviewed this product.

data.name: lblCategoryItems
data.value: Number of items to display on catalog page:

data.name: lblDefaultCategorySorting
data.value: Default sorting of products on catalog page:

data.name: lblCompleteInstructions
data.value: The installation of dashCommerce has been completed! You should now remove this install folder from your site to ensure it is not run again. You may now login with the Administrator account you just created and begin loading your site with products!

data.name: lblConfigureProvidersDescription
data.value: The Configure {1} Providers section allows you to administer the details of the specific {0} providers you have added through the Manage {1} Provider screens. Here you will set things such as usernames and passwords for the respective {0} providers you have loaded into dashCommerce.

data.name: lblConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete?

data.name: lblConnectionStringInstructions
data.value:
Before proceeding, please copy and paste the connection string below into the connectionString.config file. Simply replace the line that has:

<add name="dashCommerce" connectionString="SOMETEXT" providerName="System.Data.SqlClient" />

with the following:

data.name: lblContentManagementDescription
data.value: The Content Management section allows you to create additional web pages for your site, that may or may not be product oriented.

data.name: lblCouponDescription
data.value: The Coupon section allows you to add and edit coupons for use by your store.

data.name: lblCrossSells
data.value: You may also be interested in:

data.name: lblDatabaseInstructions
data.value:
This installer will help you with creating and installing the database for dashCommerce.

Once you have entered the information below, the information will be used to create the database and run the installer scripts.

data.name: lblDefaultPaymentProviderNotSaved
data.value: The default payment provider has not been saved.

data.name: lblDefaultPaymentProviderSaved
data.value: The default payment provider has been saved.

data.name: lblDefaultProviderInstructions
data.value: The default provider, if any, is identified in bold.

data.name: lblDefaultShippingProviderNotSaved
data.value: The default shipping provider has not been saved.

data.name: lblDefaultShippingProviderSaved
data.value: The default shipping provider has been saved.

data.name: lblDefaultTaxProviderNotSaved
data.value: The default tax provider has not been saved.

data.name: lblDefaultTaxProviderSaved
data.value: The default tax provider has been saved.

data.name: lblDescriptorSaved
data.value: The product descriptor has been saved.

data.name: lblEmailAddressesDoNotMatch
data.value: The email addresses do not match.

data.name: lblErrorLogsDescription
data.value: The Error Logs section gives you insight into errors that your site may be encountering. Some errors may occur as a natural course of your site functionality, but if something is wrong, you will want to look here for some insight into what may be happening.

data.name: lblErrorMessage
data.value: Oops! An error has occurred. This error has been logged. If the problem persists, please contact us!

data.name: lblGeneralSettingsDescription
data.value: These are the general settings for the {0} service. These settings are not {0} provider specific and apply at the store level.

data.name: lblLanguagePack
data.value: dashCommerce is localizable, so if you want to install a specific language pack to your database (and that language pack exists) then select the language below.

data.name: lblMailConfigurationDescription
data.value: The Mail Configuration section allow you to configure your SMTP server and allows you to administer notifications - emails that are send out as part of the ordering process.

data.name: lblMailSettingsDescription
data.value: Mail Settings are the settings for your SMTP server, which will be used to send the Notifications. If you are unsure about these settings, please contact your hosting provider.

data.name: lblManageCouponProviderDescription
data.value: The Manage Coupon Providers section allows you to add additional coupon providers to your store, that your store can then use to offer discounts to your customers.

data.name: lblManageProvidersDescription
data.value: The Manage {1} Providers section allows you to add, edit, and remove {0} providers into dashCommerce that can then be used by this store.

data.name: lblMembershipInstructions
data.value:
You will now create the Administrator account which will allow you administer dashCommerce.

Please keep this account information in a safe location and do not give it out.

data.name: lblNoCart
data.value: There is nothing in your cart. You may be interested in the following items:

data.name: lblNoCouponProvidersInstalled
data.value: There are no Coupon Providers installed.

data.name: lblNoDescriptors
data.value: There are no descriptors for this product.

data.name: lblNoPaymentProvidersConfigured
data.value: There are no payment providers configured. Please see the 'Configure Payment Providers' menu option.

data.name: lblNoPaymentProvidersInstalled
data.value: There are no Payment Providers installed.

data.name: lblNoReviews
data.value: There are no reviews for this product.

data.name: lblNoShippingProvidersConfigured
data.value: There are no shipping providers configured. Please see the 'Configure Shipping Providers' menu option. You may set the General Settings options below before configuring the shipping providers.

data.name: lblNoShippingProvidersInstalled
data.value: There are no Shipping Providers installed.

data.name: lblNoTaxProvidersConfigured
data.value: There are no tax providers configured. Please see the 'Configure Tax Providers' menu option.

data.name: lblNoTaxProvidersInstalled
data.value: There are no Tax Providers installed.

data.name: lblNotificationsDescription
data.value: Notifications are system generated emails that are used to inform both you and your customers to certain system events, such as order placement, order refund, and order shipment.

data.name: lblOrderSearchDescription
data.value: The Order Search is your primary method of administering the orders you receive. Here you can see the order items, the order amount and the status of the order. You can also make order notes, refund orders, etc.

data.name: lblPaymentConfigurationDescription
data.value: The Payment Configuration section allows you to administer payment providers. You can manage and configure payment providers as well as set general settings for the payment service.

data.name: lblPayPalStandardRefundInstructions
data.value: PayPal Standard transactions need to be refunded via the PayPal website. However, once you refund the transaction through PayPal, you should perform a refund here as well to keep the order in sync.

data.name: lblProductAttributesDescription
data.value: The Product Attributes section allows you to create attributes that can be associated with your products and used in the ordering process. These are product attributes such as sizes, colors, etc.

data.name: lblProductCategoriesDescription
data.value: The Product Categories section allows you to create categories that drive your store navigation and allows you to associate products with categories.

data.name: lblProductCouponsDescription
data.value: The Product Coupons sections allows you to create coupons for use by your store. Your clients can then use the coupon codes to receive discounts when shopping your store.

data.name: lblProductListingDescription
data.value: The Product Listing section is where all of the products in your store are listed. From here you can select a product and edit it.

data.name: lblProductManufacturersDescription
data.value: The Product Manufacturers section allows you to specify the manufacturers of the products you are offering.

data.name: lblRangeIsInvalid
data.value: The range is invalid for the item: {0}.

data.name: lblRoleAdministrationDescription
data.value: The Role Administration section allows you to create and modify roles that your site may use.

data.name: lblSecurityDescription
data.value: The Security section allows you to administer the accounts of registered users and the roles that your site may use.

data.name: lblShippingConfigurationDescription
data.value: The Shipping Configuration section allows you to administer shipping providers. You can manage and configure shipping providers as well as set general settings for the shipping service.

data.name: lblShippingSettingsNotSaved
data.value: The shipping settings have not been saved.

data.name: lblShippingSettingsSaved
data.value: The shipping settings have been saved.

data.name: lblSiteSettingsDescription
data.value: The Site Settings section allows you to configure many site wide options, such as Site Name, Site Logo, Language, Currency, and many other options. Many of the options here drive the behavior of your site.

data.name: lblSkuDescription
data.value: The following Sku's were created for this product based on the attribute's that are associated with this product. If you wish to save them, then then click the "Save" button.

data.name: lblTaxConfigurationDescription
data.value: The Tax Configuration section allows you to administer tax providers. You can manage and configure tax providers as well as set general settings for the tax service.

data.name: lblTotalSkuCountText
data.value: Number of Sku's created for this product:

data.name: lblTrackingLogsDescription
data.value: The Tracking Logs section is used for viewing different user behavior that may be enabled for the site. The logs created here are determined by some of the Site Settings.

data.name: lblUnableToDeleteManufacturers
data.value: Unable to delete manufacturer. There are products associated with the selected manufacturer: {0}.

data.name: lblUserAdministrationDescription
data.value: The User Administration section allows you to administer the users that have registered with your site. Here you can add and remove users from roles, and change other user settings.

data.name: lblUserUpdated
data.value: This user account has been updated.

data.name: lblWelcomeInstructions
data.value:
This installation wizard will guide you through the installation of dashCommerce.

The Message Center is where you receive feedback about the actions taken by the installer.

So, let's not waste any time . . .

data.name: prPasswordRecoverQuestionFailureText
data.value: Your answer could not be verified. Please try again.

data.name: prPasswordRecoverQuestionInstructionText
data.value: Answer the following question to receive your password!

data.name: prPasswordRecoverSuccessText
data.value: Your password has been sent to you.

data.name: prPasswordRecoverUserNameFailureText
data.value: We were unable to access your information. Please try again.

data.name: prPasswordRecoverUserNameInstructionText
data.value: Enter your User Name to receive your password.

data.name: rfvAmountPerUnit
data.value: Please supply an Amount Per Unit.

data.name: rfvApiUserName
data.value: Please supply an API User Name.

data.name: rfvDatabaseUserName
data.value: Please provide a Database User Name.

data.name: lblPermissions
data.value: You need to give the NETWORK SERVICE account "READ" and "WRITE" permissions on the 'repository' directory (ASP.NET account for XP).

data.name: lblLicenseAgreementInstructions
data.value: Please review the dashCommerce License Agreement and select "I Agree" to accept the terms of the dashCommerce License. If you do not accept the terms, please discontinue the install and remove dashCommerce.

data.name: chkAgreeToLicense
data.value: I Agree to the Terms and Conditions as set forth in the dashCommerce License, noted above.

data.name: lblVersionCheckInstructions
data.value: A version check will now be performed against your database in order to determine which version of dashCommerce you have installed. Upgrades will be performed from version 3.0 RC to the current version. If the version we determine is not correct, then please proceed with caution and ensure you run the upgrade against a backup version of your database before proceeding.

data.name: lblAssembliesTitle
data.value: You have the following assemblies in your application:

data.name: lblCopyright
data.value: dashCommerce® is Copyright © 2008-2011 Mettle Systems LLC. All Rights Reserved.

data.name: lblLicenseAgreement
data.value: dashCommerce is licensed under the following license. If you do not accept the terms, please discontinue the use of dashCommerce and uninstall dashCommerce.

data.name: lblStoreNotice
data.value:
dashCommerce is highly customizable. You can select different providers for your store and you can customize the skins. If you don't find what you are looking for, please visit the dashCommerce Store for additional add-ons to your dashCommerce store. At the dashCommerce Store, you will find the following:
  • Hosting Services
  • Payment Providers
  • Shipping Providers
  • Tax Providers
  • Commercial Licenses
  • Support Packages
  • dashCommerce Utilities
  • . . . and much more!

data.name: lblTrademark
data.value: dashCommerce, and the dashCommerce logo are registered trademarks of Mettle Systems LLC. Mettle Systems LLC logos and trademarks may not be used without prior written consent.

data.name: titleAddEditRegion
data.value: dashCommerce :: Content Management :: Add / Edit Region

data.name: chkReInstall
data.value: I would like to reinstall the database.

data.name: lblCartChanged
data.value: Your cart has been modified. This is normally due to inventory fluctuations in the normal course of business. Please review your cart to ensure the order will fulfill your needs.

data.name: lblCustomerInformationDescription
data.value: The Customer Information section allows you to perform some action on behalf of a user. These are primarily maintenance functions.

data.name: lblAdditionalPaymentMethods
data.value: Note: You will be able to add additional payment options later in this set-up process.

data.name: lblPayPalPro
data.value: Advanced e-commerce solution for established businesses. See Quick Demo

data.name: lblPayPalWebsitePaymentsStandard
data.value: Easy to get started. No monthly fees. See Quick Demo

data.name: lblComeBackLater
data.value: Our store has been closed for maintenance. Please visit us again soon as we appreciate you stopping by. We apologize for any inconvenience.

data.name: lblStoreClosedAdminLink
data.value: If you are the administrator and have failed to turn the store back on, please login and open the store.

data.name: rbAllInOne
data.value: I want an all-in-one payment solution that includes a payment gateway and an internet merchant account. Choose your all-in-one solution:

data.name: rbExisting
data.value: I prefer a payment gateway that works with my existing internet merchant account. Choose your gateway:

data.name: lblPayPalAcceleratedInstructions
data.value: PayPal: Proven to increase sales. According to Jupiter Research, 23% of online shoppers like to pay with PayPal.* If you offer your visitors the choice to pay with PayPal, they will be more likely to buy.

data.name: lblPayPaAcceleratedNote
data.value: * September 2007 Jupiter Research study of payment preferences online.

data.name: rbAPICredentials
data.value: API credentials for payments and post-checkout operations: (can be setup later)

data.name: rbEmailAddress
data.value: Email address to receive PayPal payment:

data.name: pnlPayPalAcceleratedBoardingSetup
data.value: PayPal Express Checkout Accelerated Boarding Setup

data.name: lblManualTransaction
data.value: If for some reason you should fail to receive transaction information from your payment processor, you can manually add the necessary information here to process the transaction as if your site had received the necessary information from the payment processor. Please use this functionality only as a backup to normal operating procedures.

data.name: lblAboutDescription
data.value: You will find information about dashCommerce here.

data.name: lblCommunityForumsDescription
data.value: If you need some help with dashCommerce, please check out our forums! There is plenty of help there and some other resources for you to use!

data.name: lblDashCommerceComDescription
data.value: dashCommerce.com is where you will find a new, advanced version of dashCommerce for those that would like to have a fully managed and hosted version of dashCommerce.

data.name: lblDashCommerceOrgDescription
data.value: dashCommerce.org is the home of dashCommerce. Here you will find all sorts of resources for your dashCommerce site installation and help in the forums.

data.name: lblDocumentationDescription
data.value: Need some additional documentation? Here you will find some.

data.name: lblConnectionStringDoesNotExist
data.value: There is no connection string for dashCommerce in connectionString.config. Please add the necessary information.

data.name: rfvNewOrExistingDatabase
data.value: Please select if you would like to CREATE a new database or if you would like to use an EXISTING database.

data.name: lblPaymentSolutions
data.value: dashCommerce supports the following payment solutions. Please select which payment solution you would like to use and we will help sign you up with that payment solution.
